alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fayette, northwestern Hardeman and south central Haywood Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Somerville, or 17 miles northeast of Cordova, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Somerville, Dancyville, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Gallaway, Williston, Grand Junction, Braden, Yum Yum, Fayette Corners, Laconia, Cedar Chapel, Longtown, Moorman, Taylor Chapel, Lambert, Miller and Hickory Withe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
